title: Nyame, Wɔ Dɔ Na Ͻbɔɔ Nnipa Ny'naa

lines: Nyame, Wo dɔ na ɛbɔɔ nnipa mma ny'naa,
Na adi Wo mma anim 'besi nnɛ,
Wo Honhom yi Ne tumi adi ky'rɛ.
Yefi ɔbra sum mu abasamtu mu,
Dan yɛn ho hwehwɛ Wo nokware hann no,
Na yehu Wo dom a ɛretwɛn yɛn.
Fa mmɔb'rɔhun' hwɛ Wo mma sɛ wɔrep're,
Kosi sɛ Wo nokware bewie pɛyɛ,
Na yɛahu nnepa henkyɛw wɔ Kristom.
Hyɛ W'asafo den 'sase so haw nyinaam',
Kosi sɛ akodi wiase yi de dɛw,
Bɛte ɔsoro dɔ kɛse no nka.
